personal.name: Pravat Behera
personal.title: Fullstack Web Developer
personal.bio: Experienced frontend developer specializing in building beautiful and highly performant web applications with modern technologies like React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS.

hero.subtitle: Building modern web experiences with clean code and thoughtful design.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate fullstack web developer with a focus on creating intuitive and responsive web applications. With over 2 years of personal experience through self-learning from online sources, I've worked on a variety of projects from small websites to large-scale web applications.
paragraphs: I specialize in building modern web applications using React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. My approach combines technical expertise with a keen eye for design to create exceptional user experiences.

Outside of coding, I enjoy hiking, photography, and continually learning new technologies to expand my skill set. I'm always open to new challenges and opportunities to collaborate on interesting projects.
keyPoints: Specializing in React and modern JavaScript
Skilled in responsive and accessible design
